other_tests.procedure_name: Endoscopic placement of internal pigtail drain

other_tests.findings: Initial MRCP showed an undrained fluid collection at the tail of the pancreas; later MRCP showed necrotizing pancreatitis with modest interval decrease in the size of multiple fluid collections, including the dominant collection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progression noted from an undrained fluid collection to a decrease in the size of fluid collections.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated Gastrocystic catheters in place, evolving extensive granulation tissue, severe post-inflammatory changes involving the pancreas and surrounding region, and minimal residual necrotic fluid collection along the tail.
